title: Owner - An owner is a person who has legal title for land or building
clause_text: Owner - An owner is a person who has legal title for land or building. The definition also includes :- An agent or trustee who receives the rent on behalf of the owner;
section: Special Regulations for the Improvement Schemes :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
